original_text: Those six towns will be safe places for Israelites and for foreign people who live among them. Anyone who has killed another person may run to one of these towns and be safe there. But they will only be safe if they did not mean to kill the other person.
korean_text: 이 여섯 성읍은 이스라엘 자손과 타국인과 이스라엘 중에 거류하는 자의 도피성이 되리니 부지중에 살인한 모든 자가 그리로 도피할 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Those six towns will be safe places
sentences.korean_translation: 그 여섯 도시는 안전한 장소가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for Israelites and for foreign people
Anyone who has killed another person
may run to one of these towns
sentences.korean_translation: 이 도시 중 하나로 도망칠 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But they will only be safe
if they did not mean to kill
